              },

                "click": {
                  "event": "click",
                  "action": "Insert a Document",
                  "doctype": "Stock Reconciliation",
                  "fields": [
                    {
                      "field": "purpose",
                      "value": "stockRecoPurpose",
                      "name": "rzq259duz"
                    },
                    {
                      "field": "items",
                      "value": "selectedItem",
                      "name": "7sgj30pht"
                    }
                  ],
                  "on_success": "script",
                  "on_error": "message",
                  "error_message": "Failed!",
                  "on_success_script":"function onSuccess(data) { forSubmitDoc.value = { doctype: \"Stock Reconciliation\", docname: data.name, timestamp: Date.now() }; studio.showToast({ message: \"Draft \" + data.name + \" created. Submitting...\", type: 'success' }); }"
                }
              },

      ]
    }

    "gap": "10px",

    "height": "100vh",

    "top": "0"

    "\"duration-300\"",
    "\"ease-in-out\"",
    "\"{{ inputs.isOpen ? 'opacity-100' : 'opacity-0 pointer-events-none' }}\""
  ]
}
